name: Inverted (itch)
description:
Puzzle platformer. Invert the world to complete the level.

  • Over 4 colours!
  • 16 levels!
  • Choose from 1 character!

Made in 48 Hours for Ludum Dare 26 for the theme of minimalism.

Controls

  • Use either WASD or the arrow keys to move
  • Ctrl to invert the screen (Activates after level 9)

Check out the ludum dare page.
